item.title: watching in 2024 : Various Approaches to Coexisting with Fate
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: GPT: This passage explores various perspectives on fate through the analysis of different works, including “Blossoms Shanghai,” “The Long Season,” “Only the River Flows,” and “Journey to the West (sff).” It delves into how individuals reconcile with fate, highlighting themes of acceptance, madness, and awakening. Ultimately, it suggests that coexisting with fate entails maintaining a positive attitude towards survival and finding compromise or acceptance of the inevitable.

item.title: On Motivation: The Genuine and Counterfeit in Anime and Manga
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: The concepts of “genuine” and “counterfeit” are common topics in anime and manga. I believe clarifying this issue is crucial for properly understanding utilitarian mindsets.
